Name: American VR Coasters
About the game: Collection of American VR Coasters. Experience 4 types of different VR Coasters that will bring you new amazing impressions! American Liberty Coaster Fascinating coaster on Liberty island in the style of old ATARI games. Climb to the Statue of Liberty and get the inexpressible emotions! American Euthanasia Coaster The Euthanasia Coaster is an art concept for a steel roller coaster designed to kill its passengers. In 2010, it was designed and made into a scale model by Julijonas Urbonas, a PhD candidate at the Royal College of Art in London. Urbonas, who has worked at an amusement park, stated that the goal of his concept roller coaster is to take lives 'with elegance and euphoria'. As for practical applications of his design, Urbonas mentioned 'euthanasia' or 'execution'. American Crazy City Coaster A fantastic trip in a big city filled with skyscrapers. You are waiting for jumps and free fall with the biggest skyscraper! American Mega Kingda Ka Coaster The famous Kingda Ka now even better! Experience new sensations on the legendary coaster! Controls (Keyboard): 'R' - Recenter; 'Esc' - Back to main menu/Exit;
